```{r}
data <- read.csv(here("data", "data export 20240424.csv"), sep = ";")
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

## Replace "Not Available" with NA

```{r}
# Replace "Not Available" with NA in specified columns
energy_data <- data %>%
  mutate(
    Solar.Energy.Production...Quadrillion.Btu. = na_if(Solar.Energy.Production...Quadrillion.Btu., "Not Available"),
    Wind.Energy.Production...Quadrillion.Btu. = na_if(Wind.Energy.Production...Quadrillion.Btu., "Not Available")
  )

# Check the structure to ensure changes are applied
str(energy_data)
```
